import React, { Component } from 'react' import ContactForm from './contactfrom' import axios from 'axios' const BASE_URL = "https://my-json-server.typicode.com/lhmisho/React-Tutorial/themeOneContactSection" class Contact extends Component { state = { heading: 'Бидэнтэй холбогдоорой', content: 'anime', address: '121 King St, Melbourne VIC 3000, Australia' } componentDidMount(){ axios.get(`${BASE_URL}`) .then(res => { this.setState({ data: res.data }) // console.log(this.state) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render() { return (

{this.state.heading}

{this.state.content}

{this.state.branch}

{this.state.address}

  • Phone: {this.state.content}
  • Email : {this.state.email}
) } } export default Contact
